name: explanatorily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or provides an explanation: Simple models can be explanatorily powerful. Their analysis is explanatorily incomplete, and requires much more detail. He held up his glass and said explanatorily, "Pink champagne." Related word
explanatoryCompare
explanatively
More examplesFewer examplesOne presentation of the material can be more explanatorily powerful than another.I believe that this framework is explanatorily inadequate for our purposes.I am not sure whether this factor is explanatorily significant or not.She has picked out only the information that is explanatorily relevant.
